instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15” Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Macbook 15 retina 2012 CPU throtle / low performance
threads.message:
Hi, working on an Macbook pro 15 Retina ( 2012 ), the computer works perfectly, but if i put to geekbench or other benchmarking software, the multicore score is low (average for that model is arroud 10000 but it only performs like 5k, the single core is correct.
The other problem is that the CPU temperatures is instable, i  can work for like half an hour and its all perfect, but sometimes it starts to raise fan speed and with some software to measure temperatures, it raises like 20 30ºC in 1 second and goes back to normal and when this happen, the cpu reachs to 105ºC and starts throtling.
Since is a common problem i already resolder the <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> but the results are the same. 
The computer dont have any liquid damage, and of corse i try with fresh OS install and replace thermal paste.
ASD or AHT dont show any errors

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Macbook 15 retina 2012 CPU throtle / low performance
threads.message: Bad heat pipe also happens on these. See if the heat pipe is conducting heat well when system under load.
